name: Exquisite Corpses
description:
A minimalist game about irretrievable breakdowns, traversing bad memories, & finding majesty in the trappings of failure.

The text you'll see is from a chat transcript between two people on the verge of ending a relationship, and is remixed each time you pass through. The scenery is composed of glitched graphics, many of which were used in a previous piece of the same title. (Thanks to Alex Myers for some of the additional models)
